MESSAGE.JP: 翌朝は当然のように寝不足だ。
MESSAGE.EN: Come next morning, it was obvious I hadn't gotten enough sleep.
MESSAGE.Translation: Come next morning, it was obvious I hadn't gotten enough sleep.

MESSAGE.JP: だが当事者の真人は違うようで、すでに起きて、窓越しの小さな庭で筋トレをしていた。
MESSAGE.EN: However, Masato was different and had already awoken. From the window I could see him doing weight training in the small garden.
MESSAGE.Translation: However, Masato was different and had already awoken. From the window I could see him doing weight training in the small garden.

MESSAGE.JP: その元気さには呆れるしかない。
MESSAGE.EN: I was amazed by his energy.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was amazed by his energy.

MESSAGE.JP: 朝食を食べに、真人と共に食堂へと足を運ぶ。
MESSAGE.EN: We went to the cafeteria together to eat breakfast.
MESSAGE.Translation: We went to the cafeteria together to eat breakfast.

MESSAGE.JP: 同じように寝起きの生徒で、食堂は埋め尽くされていた。
MESSAGE.EN: With the other students getting up as well, the cafeteria was filled to the brim.
MESSAGE.Translation: With the other students getting up as well, the cafeteria was filled to the brim.

MESSAGE.JP: それでも僕たちの席は空いていた。
先に来ていた謙吾が確保していてくれたからだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Because Kengo had arrived before us and saved some seats for us.
MESSAGE.Translation: Because Kengo had arrived before us and saved some seats for us.

MESSAGE.JP: 正確には、確保していないのかもしれない。
MESSAGE.EN: Or more precisely, I guess he hadn't intended to.
MESSAGE.Translation: Or more precisely, I guess he hadn't intended to.

MESSAGE.JP: ただ、彼の周りにはた迷惑な僕たちが集まってくるのを誰もが知っていたから、結果的に空いてるだけなのかもしれない。
MESSAGE.EN: It's just that most people who know us treat us as troublemakers and often avoid sitting around us.
MESSAGE.Translation: It's just that most people who know us treat us as troublemakers and often avoid sitting around us.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「ようっ、おはよう」
`謙吾@「あぁ、おはよう。おまえらにしては早いな」
短く挨拶だけを済ませて、自分の朝食を載せた盆と共にテーブルにつく。
MESSAGE.EN: Having finished our short greetings, we placed our breakfast trays on the table.
MESSAGE.Translation: Having finished our short greetings, we placed our breakfast trays on the table.

MESSAGE.JP: やがて恭介も現れて、同じように席につく。
MESSAGE.EN: Soon after, Kyousuke appeared and took a seat.
MESSAGE.Translation: Soon after, Kyousuke appeared and took a seat.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「うぃす」
`真人@「おぅ」
`理樹@「今回はどこいってたの？」
`恭介@「え？　あー、出版社」
`理樹@「東京でしょ？」
`恭介@「そ、東京」
`理樹@「徒歩で？」
`恭介@「そ、徒歩で」
`理樹@「大変だったでしょ」
`真人@「大変つーか…」
`謙吾@「あほだな…」
`恭介@「金がないんだ、仕方ないだろ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝I don't have much money, nothing I can do.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝I don't have much money, nothing I can do.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「おまえらも絶対来年こうなるからな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝I'm pretty sure you guys will do the same thing next year, too.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝I'm pretty sure you guys will do the same thing next year, too.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「とりあえず徒歩で就職活動はしないけどさ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝At the very least, we're not planning on doing our job hunting on foot...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝At the very least, we're not planning on doing our job hunting on foot...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 最後に現れたのは鈴。
昨日の猫を肩に載せて、食堂に入ってきた。
MESSAGE.EN: With the cat she'd found yesterday perched on her shoulder, she entered the cafeteria.
MESSAGE.Translation: With the cat she'd found yesterday perched on her shoulder, she entered the cafeteria.

MESSAGE.JP: だが、その後にも、猫がわらわらと続いてくる。
MESSAGE.EN: However, more cats followed her in.
MESSAGE.Translation: However, more cats followed her in.

MESSAGE.JP: それを押し戻し、何度も出たり入ったりを繰り返している。
MESSAGE.EN: She kept pushing them back outside, but they repeatedly entered again and again.
MESSAGE.Translation: She kept pushing them back outside, but they repeatedly entered again and again.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「ふかーーーっ！」
最後に一喝して、怯えさせてから、こっちに走って逃げてくる。
MESSAGE.EN: Suddenly faced with Rin's vehement hissing, the cats finally got scared and ran off.
MESSAGE.Translation: Suddenly faced with Rin's vehement hissing, the cats finally got scared and ran off.

MESSAGE.JP: ふぅ、とため息をつきながら、席につく。
MESSAGE.EN: Huu～, she sighed while taking a seat.
MESSAGE.Translation: Huu～, she sighed while taking a seat.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「新入りだっ」
`真人@「知ってるよ」
みんなにそう告げてから、お皿に牛乳を注ぐ。
MESSAGE.EN: After informing us, she poured some milk onto a plate.
MESSAGE.Translation: After informing us, she poured some milk onto a plate.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「名前は？」
`鈴@「まだ」
`恭介@「名前は大事だぞ。ちゃんとつけろよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝A name is an important thing. Give it one properly.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝A name is an important thing. Give it one properly.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「だって、覚えきれない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝But, I can't think of any more.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝But, I can't think of any more.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介は、ことあるごとに野良猫を拾ってきては、鈴にプレゼントしている。
MESSAGE.EN: With every opportunity, Kyousuke would gather stray cats and give them to Rin as presents.
MESSAGE.Translation: With every opportunity, Kyousuke would gather stray cats and give them to Rin as presents.

MESSAGE.JP: いまでは、鈴の周りは猫だらけだ。
MESSAGE.EN: So now she was surrounded by a veritable herd of cats.
MESSAGE.Translation: So now she was surrounded by a veritable herd of cats.

MESSAGE.JP: あまりの数の多さに手に負えず、鈴はこうして一番新しい猫だけを世話することに決めている。
MESSAGE.EN: But that many are impossible to manage at once, so she decided just to look after the newest cat.
MESSAGE.Translation: But that many are impossible to manage at once, so she decided just to look after the newest cat.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「じゃ、仕方ない。俺がつけてやるか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Then, I guess I'll have to name it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Then, I guess I'll have to name it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「レノン」
`理樹@「また何も考えず、有名人の名前を…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Did you even think about it at all? Yet another famous name...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Did you even think about it at all? Yet another famous name...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「大事だと言うわりに、おまえはいつも適当だな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝You said it's important, but you never choose proper names...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝You said it's important, but you never choose proper names...❞

MESSAGE.JP: そんなふうにいつも恭介が適当につけるから、鈴の猫は、アインシュタインとかゲイツとかヒトラーとか、名前だけ並べるとものすごい顔ぶれになる。
MESSAGE.EN: Since Kyousuke always names the cats without thinking, they all have very famous names: Einstein, Gates, Hitler...
MESSAGE.Translation: Since Kyousuke always names the cats without thinking, they all have very famous names: Einstein, Gates, Hitler...

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「大事なのは名前がじゃない。名前をつけることが大事だと言っているんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝It's not the name that's important. I said giving them a name is.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝It's not the name that's important. I said giving them a name is.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「なんだよ、それ。一緒じゃねぇか」
`鈴@「レノンか。でもまあ、かわいくはあるな」
鈴は由来を知らないのだろう。響きだけすれば、確かにアインシュタインとかゲイツとかヒトラーよりはよっぽどペットの名前らしい。
MESSAGE.EN: I guess Rin doesn't know the origin of the name. But certainly, ❛Lennon❜ sounds like a more appropriate pet name than ❛Einstein,❜ ❛Gates❜ or ❛Hitler.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: I guess Rin doesn't know the origin of the name. But certainly, ❛Lennon❜ sounds like a more appropriate pet name than ❛Einstein,❜ ❛Gates❜ or ❛Hitler.❜

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「これ食うかな」
`恭介@「おー、わかめ食ったぞ、こいつ」
`鈴@「そんなもの食わすなっ、あほかっ」
`鈴@「こっちだ、こっちのほうが絶対おいしい」
女生徒のみ定食についてくるカップゼリーを差し出す（この歳の子にそんなものを付けるのもどうかと思うが）。
MESSAGE.EN: The cafeteria cooks always give female students a cup jelly as a dessert. She tried feeding it to him.
MESSAGE.Translation: The cafeteria cooks always give female students a cup jelly as a dessert. She tried feeding it to him.

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「猫に食わせるものはちゃんと考えたほうがいいんじゃないのか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Are you giving proper thought to what the cat can eat?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Are you giving proper thought to what the cat can eat?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴は謙吾の言葉も聞こえていないのか、小さなカップを前足で押さえて鼻先を突っ込む猫にじーっと見入っている…。
MESSAGE.EN: Our words were lost on Rin, who was absorbed in observing the cat holding the small cup with its forepaw and pulling it under its nose.
MESSAGE.Translation: Our words were lost on Rin, who was absorbed in observing the cat holding the small cup with its forepaw and pulling it under its nose.

MESSAGE.JP: 可愛かったらなんでもいいんだと言わんばかりだ（本人は口が裂けても言わないだろうけど）。
MESSAGE.EN: It seems that she doesn't care just as long as the cat looks cute eating it (though I'm sure she'd never say so herself).
MESSAGE.Translation: It seems that she doesn't care just as long as the cat looks cute eating it (though I'm sure she'd never say so herself).

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「みそ汁は飲むだろうか、試してみよう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Can it drink miso soup? Try it out.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Can it drink miso soup? Try it out.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「ふかーっ！」
鈴が威嚇した！
`真人@「草っぽいこいつはどうだろう」
今度は真人が$K4バラン$K0を箸で寄せていく。
MESSAGE.EN: This time, Masato held a $K4baran sheet$K0 out to it.
MESSAGE.Translation: This time, Masato held a $K4baran sheet$K0 out to it.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「食えるかーっ！」
まるでみんな、昨日あったことなんてすっかり忘れてしまっているようだ。
MESSAGE.EN: It seemed that everyone had already completely forgotten about what happened yesterday.
MESSAGE.Translation: It seemed that everyone had already completely forgotten about what happened yesterday.

MESSAGE.JP: でもそれが日常なんだから、みんな慣れてしまっているんだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: But that was our everyday life, so they were probably used to it.
MESSAGE.Translation: But that was our everyday life, so they were probably used to it.

MESSAGE.JP: ただ僕ひとりは、彼らとは価値観が違うようで、戸惑ってばかりいた。
MESSAGE.EN: I alone found myself puzzled by the difference in our sense of values.
MESSAGE.Translation: I alone found myself puzzled by the difference in our sense of values.

MESSAGE.JP: 幼い日、出会った時から彼らはそんなふうだったのに。
MESSAGE.EN: It'd always been like this, ever since the day we met.
MESSAGE.Translation: It'd always been like this, ever since the day we met.

MESSAGE.JP: 何ひとつ変わっていない。
ただその戸惑いも、時間が経ってから思い出すと、自然と頬が緩む。
MESSAGE.EN: However, even as I was confused, I could only smile as I reflected on the past.
MESSAGE.Translation: However, even as I was confused, I could only smile as I reflected on the past.

MESSAGE.JP: 戸惑いながらも、楽しんでいることに気づく。
MESSAGE.EN: I realized that despite my bewilderment, I was still having fun.
MESSAGE.Translation: I realized that despite my bewilderment, I was still having fun.

MESSAGE.JP: そして、また僕は願う。
こんな楽しい時間がいつまでも続きますようにと。
MESSAGE.EN: I wished such pleasant times could continue forever.
MESSAGE.Translation: I wished such pleasant times could continue forever.

MESSAGE.JP: 皆で一緒に登校。
MESSAGE.EN: After breakfast, we headed toward school together.
MESSAGE.Translation: After breakfast, we headed toward school together.

MESSAGE.JP: とは言っても、学舎は寮と隣接しているから、鞄を持って、この渡り廊下を渡るだけ。
MESSAGE.EN: However, since the school building was next to the dorms, our trip ended quickly.
MESSAGE.Translation: However, since the school building was next to the dorms, our trip ended quickly.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「でも、就職決まったら遊び放題なんだろ？　いいねぇ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝So once you get a job, you'll have all the free time you want till March? Ain't that nice.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝So once you get a job, you'll have all the free time you want till March? Ain't that nice.❞

MESSAGE.JP: それでもこの中庭の自然を見ながら歩けることは、開放感をえられる貴重な時間だった。
MESSAGE.EN: Even so, the time we could spend walking and enjoying the beautiful nature of the courtyard was precious and soothing.
MESSAGE.Translation: Even so, the time we could spend walking and enjoying the beautiful nature of the courtyard was precious and soothing.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「そんな気楽なもんじゃないぜ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝It won't be that laid back, you know.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝It won't be that laid back, you know.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「色々考えていかなくちゃいけないことがある」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝There are a lot of things I have to think about.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝There are a lot of things I have to think about.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「人生設計？　早いね」
`恭介@「今だけしかできないことがあるってことだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝No, about things that can only be done now.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝No, about things that can only be done now.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「でも一年後には、僕たちも受験か、就職活動やってるんだね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But... next year, we'll be preparing for college exams or looking for a job, don't you think?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But... next year, we'll be preparing for college exams or looking for a job, don't you think?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「ここまで一緒だったオレたちも、その後は、散り散りになるかもな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Even though we've always been together so far, we might become separated from each other.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Even though we've always been together so far, we might become separated from each other.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「少なくとも恭介は一年先にそうなる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝At least it'll already be so for Kyousuke one year earlier than us.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝At least it'll already be so for Kyousuke one year earlier than us.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「考えたくねーな、そんな先のこと」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Don't even wanna think about it... that kind of future.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Don't even wanna think about it... that kind of future.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「そうだな…」
そして、恭介もそれを願った。
`恭介@「今がずっと続けばいいのにな」
それは、なんとも心強い一言だった。
恭介が願うなら、本当にそうなるような気がした。
MESSAGE.EN: I thought it would surely come true if only Kyousuke wished so.
MESSAGE.Translation: I thought it would surely come true if only Kyousuke wished so.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ねぇ、昔みたいに、みんなで何かしない？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Say, why don't we do something, like in the old days?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Say, why don't we do something, like in the old days?❞

MESSAGE.JP: だから僕はそう提案していた。
`真人@「なんだよ、唐突に」
`謙吾@「何かって？」
`理樹@「ほら、小学生の時。何かを悪に仕立て上げては近所をかっぽしてたでしょ、みんなで」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Remember grade school? We'd go around the neighborhood and look for bad guys and beat them up.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Remember grade school? We'd go around the neighborhood and look for bad guys and beat them up.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「おまえらと一緒にするな」
恭介なら、そうしてくれるはずだ。
１０年という月日が経っても、僕と同じ気持ちでいたから。
MESSAGE.EN: Because, even though ten years have already passed, he still felt the same way I did.
MESSAGE.Translation: Because, even though ten years have already passed, he still felt the same way I did.

MESSAGE.JP: そして、今も、恭介は僕たちのリーダーだったから。
MESSAGE.EN: Besides, even now he was our leader.
MESSAGE.Translation: Besides, even now he was our leader.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「じゃ…」
恭介が屈んでいた。
その手が何かを拾い上げる。
スピンをかけて回した。
MESSAGE.EN: Then he gave it a spin.
MESSAGE.Translation: Then he gave it a spin.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「…野球をしよう」
茶色くくすんでしまった白球を。
僕以外はその言葉が理解できなかったようで怪訝な声をあげている。
MESSAGE.EN: Everyone, dumbfounded by Kyousuke's words, exclaimed in surprise.
MESSAGE.Translation: Everyone, dumbfounded by Kyousuke's words, exclaimed in surprise.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「野球だよ」
もう一度皆に向き直り、そう告げた。
MESSAGE.EN: He turned around and announced it to us again.
MESSAGE.Translation: He turned around and announced it to us again.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「野球チームを作る」
`恭介@「チーム名は…リトルバスターズだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝The team name will be... Little Busters!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝The team name will be... Little Busters!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 夢を見ていた。
僕はその内容を思い出すまいと、窓の外に視線を向け、グラウンドで行われているサッカーの試合に見入った。
MESSAGE.EN: Without trying to remember what it was about, I gazed out of the window at a soccer match playing out in the schoolyard.
MESSAGE.Translation: Without trying to remember what it was about, I gazed out of the window at a soccer match playing out in the schoolyard.

MESSAGE.JP: いつものことだ。
MESSAGE.EN: It was the same as always.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was the same as always.

MESSAGE.JP: 意識を失うようにして突然僕が寝入ってしまうことは。
MESSAGE.EN: I would suddenly fall asleep, like suddenly losing consciousness.
MESSAGE.Translation: I would suddenly fall asleep, like suddenly losing consciousness.

MESSAGE.JP: それは、幼い頃から僕が抱えている病気。
MESSAGE.EN: That's because of an illness I've had since childhood.
MESSAGE.Translation: That's because of an illness I've had since childhood.

MESSAGE.JP: ナルコレプシー…
眠り病だ。
教師からも黙認されている。
MESSAGE.EN: My teachers were aware of it, so they tolerated my sleeping during class.
MESSAGE.Translation: My teachers were aware of it, so they tolerated my sleeping during class.

MESSAGE.JP: この病気に対する理解は学校側にもあるし、それで僕が成績を落とすようなこともないからだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Everyone else at school understood, and my grades weren't bad either.
MESSAGE.Translation: Everyone else at school understood, and my grades weren't bad either.

MESSAGE.JP: でも、今の状態には少し違和感があった。
MESSAGE.EN: However, I was a little uncomfortable with it myself.
MESSAGE.Translation: However, I was a little uncomfortable with it myself.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕が昼に見る夢は決まって悪夢だ。
MESSAGE.EN: Since my daydreams were always nightmares,
MESSAGE.Translation: Since my daydreams were always nightmares,

MESSAGE.JP: だから絶対に思い出さないようにしている。
MESSAGE.EN: I tried hard not to remember them.
MESSAGE.Translation: I tried hard not to remember them.

MESSAGE.JP: だけど、今見ていた夢は思い出そうにも、思い出せない…そんな気がした。
MESSAGE.EN: But I don't think I could remember the dream I'd just seen, even if I tried.
MESSAGE.Translation: But I don't think I could remember the dream I'd just seen, even if I tried.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は…果たして夢を見ていたのだろうか？
MESSAGE.EN: ...Did I really see a dream, at all?
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Did I really see a dream, at all?

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「どうした、暗い顔して」
隣の真人が話しかけてくる。
MESSAGE.EN: Masato, whose desk was next to mine, spoke to me.
MESSAGE.Translation: Masato, whose desk was next to mine, spoke to me.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、べつになにも」
`真人@「水くさい奴だな。筋肉の相談ならいつでも乗るぜ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Don't act so cold. If you're worried about your muscles, why don't you talk to me?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Don't act so cold. If you're worried about your muscles, why don't you talk to me?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、それについては一生悩まないから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'm sure I'll never be worried over that in my life.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'm sure I'll never be worried over that in my life.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `女生徒@「ねぇ、棗さん、知らない？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Female Student@❝Say, where can I find Natsume-san?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Female Student@❝Say, where can I find Natsume-san?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 女子生徒が僕たちに話しかけてきた。
彼女の言う棗さんとは、妹のほう、鈴のことだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: I think she's looking for Rin.
MESSAGE.Translation: I think she's looking for Rin.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「ん、あー？」
真人が座ったまま、伸びをして鈴の席を確かめてから、そこにいないんだったら知らない、と手を広げてみせた。
MESSAGE.EN: Masato pointed at Rin's seat and, confirming that she was indeed absent from it, shrugged to show that he had no other guess.
MESSAGE.Translation: Masato pointed at Rin's seat and, confirming that she was indeed absent from it, shrugged to show that he had no other guess.

MESSAGE.JP: `女生徒@「日直なのに、黒板、消してないんだよね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Female Student@❝She's on day duty today, but the blackboard hasn't been cleaned.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Female Student@❝She's on day duty today, but the blackboard hasn't been cleaned.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ああ…」
そういえば、さっきの休み時間は、その背中に猫を貼り付けたまま黒板を消していたことを思い出す。
MESSAGE.EN: Come to think of it, she certainly was cleaning the blackboard with a cat on her back during the last break.
MESSAGE.Translation: Come to think of it, she certainly was cleaning the blackboard with a cat on her back during the last break.

MESSAGE.JP: `女生徒@「また猫と遊んでるんじゃないの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Female Student@❝I guess she must be playing with her cats again.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Female Student@❝I guess she must be playing with her cats again.❞

MESSAGE.JP: その言葉には皮肉が込められていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Her words were dripping with sarcasm.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her words were dripping with sarcasm.

MESSAGE.JP: 正直、クラス内で、鈴の同性からの人望は薄かった。
MESSAGE.EN: Actually, some of the girls in the class don't like Rin.
MESSAGE.Translation: Actually, some of the girls in the class don't like Rin.

MESSAGE.JP: 彼女は自己中心的でいつも猫のことばかり考えているし、その猫とのセットが男子からの人気が高いだけに、なおさら女生徒の神経を逆撫でしているようだった。
MESSAGE.EN: She was pretty self-centered, and only concerned herself with her cats.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was pretty self-centered, and only concerned herself with her cats.

MESSAGE.JP: 黒板を消さなかったぐらいでまた人望を失うのも可哀想だと思い、僕は鈴を探しに教室を後にする。
MESSAGE.EN: She was only worsening her image in the class by not cleaning the blackboard, poor Rin.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was only worsening her image in the class by not cleaning the blackboard, poor Rin.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴は、みごとに猫と遊んでいた。
MESSAGE.EN: As expected, Rin was playing with her cats.
MESSAGE.Translation: As expected, Rin was playing with her cats.

MESSAGE.JP: にゃぁにゃぁ！
`鈴@「揃ってるな」
鈴はスカートの裾を左手で押さえながら座りこんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin sat down, holding the hem of her skirt with her left hand.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin sat down, holding the hem of her skirt with her left hand.

MESSAGE.JP: 猫の群れを見渡す鈴。
MESSAGE.EN: She surveyed the herd of cats.
MESSAGE.Translation: She surveyed the herd of cats.

MESSAGE.JP: 猫たちは鈴にいつも興味を払っているわけではないらしい。
MESSAGE.EN: It didn't seem like they were paying much attention to Rin.
MESSAGE.Translation: It didn't seem like they were paying much attention to Rin.

MESSAGE.JP: てんでばらばらに周囲に散らばっている。
MESSAGE.EN: They were strolling around as they pleased.
MESSAGE.Translation: They were strolling around as they pleased.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「よし、今日はおまえだ」
`鈴@「おいで」
にゃ？
にゃにゃ。
てってって。
虎猫がそばにやってきた。
`鈴@「今日はすごいぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I've got something great for you today.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I've got something great for you today.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「聞いて驚け」
`鈴@「じゃん！」
鈴が取りだしたのは猫じゃらしだ。
MESSAGE.EN: She took a stalk of bristlegrass from her pocket.
MESSAGE.Translation: She took a stalk of bristlegrass from her pocket.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「この道六十五年の匠がこりこりにこだわった猫じゃらしだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝This is one of the bristlegrasses a great artisan put 65 years into making.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝This is one of the bristlegrasses a great artisan put 65 years into making.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ぴょんぴょん。
振られた猫じゃらしは恐ろしく自在にしなった。
MESSAGE.EN: She waved the grass very quickly.
MESSAGE.Translation: She waved the grass very quickly.

MESSAGE.JP: にゃー！
`鈴@「おまえにもわかるか…そうだろうそうだろう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Oh, you can tell? Yes, that's right, this is an awesome bristlegrass.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Oh, you can tell? Yes, that's right, this is an awesome bristlegrass.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「絶対に捕まえられないな」
`鈴@「捕まえるのに六十五年はかかるな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝It would take you 65 years to catch it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝It would take you 65 years to catch it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: びょんびょん。
にゃにゃ。
`鈴@「どーだどーだっ」
ぽて。
MESSAGE.EN: The cat kept failing to grasp it.
MESSAGE.Translation: The cat kept failing to grasp it.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「やっぱり難しいだろ」
`鈴@「そうだろー」
鈴は得意げだ。
びょんびょん。
猫じゃらしを見せびらかすように動かしている。
MESSAGE.EN: She waved the grass as though showing it off.
MESSAGE.Translation: She waved the grass as though showing it off.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「さすが六十五年物は違うな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝As expected of one 65 years old, it's really something else...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝As expected of one 65 years old, it's really something else...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「きっと寮長は手に入れるのに苦労しただろう…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I'm sure it must've been a tough thing for the dorm head to get her hands on...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I'm sure it must've been a tough thing for the dorm head to get her hands on...❞

MESSAGE.JP: いや、それは違うと思うよ鈴…。
MESSAGE.EN: No, Rin, I'm not so sure about that...
MESSAGE.Translation: No, Rin, I'm not so sure about that...

MESSAGE.JP: にゃっ。
びょんびょ…たし。
`鈴@「…なにぃ…」
にゃ～。
虎猫は見事に猫じゃらしを押さえた。
MESSAGE.EN: The tabby cat splendidly caught hold of the bristlegrass.
MESSAGE.Translation: The tabby cat splendidly caught hold of the bristlegrass.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「もう六十五年経ったのか…」
早っ！
`鈴@「というかおまえがすごいだけか」
`鈴@「常人、じゃない常猫（じょうねこ）の何倍もすごいな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝You're much better than any ordinary person... no, any ordinary cat.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝You're much better than any ordinary person... no, any ordinary cat.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「よし、ヒットラー、おまえのあだ名は五十六（いそろく）にしよう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Okay, Hitler, your nickname will be Isoroku.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Okay, Hitler, your nickname will be Isoroku.❞

MESSAGE.JP: すごい掛け合わせだ…。
MESSAGE.EN: The cats names keep getting more intimidating...
MESSAGE.Translation: The cats names keep getting more intimidating...

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「五十六、リベンジだ。ほらびょんびょん」
にゃ！　にゃ！
`鈴@「あたしがもっと動かせばダメだろおまえ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝If I swing it faster, you won't catch it, right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝If I swing it faster, you won't catch it, right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「あさっぷあさっぷ！」
`鈴@「…早いはあさっぷってばか兄貴言ってたけど」
`鈴@「あさっぷってなんだろ」
鈴がふと考え込んで動きが止まった隙に猫じゃらしが押さえつけられる。
MESSAGE.EN: While she was pondering it, the cat caught the bristlegrass again.
MESSAGE.Translation: While she was pondering it, the cat caught the bristlegrass again.

MESSAGE.JP: にゃ。たし。
`鈴@「…なにぃ…」
`鈴@「また六十五年経ったのか…」
`鈴@「こういん矢のごとしだな…」
`鈴@「こういんとは光と影だ。銀行のひとじゃないんだぞ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝That's the verb ❛to fly❜, not the insect. Got it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝That's the verb ❛to fly❜, not the insect. Got it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: にゃ。にゃ。
びょんびょん。
`鈴@「ん？　んん？」
ぐいー、と鈴は猫じゃらしを持ち上げた。
にゃ？
猫じゃらしを前足で押さえている猫が持ち上がる。
MESSAGE.EN: The cat, holding onto the grass with its forepaws, was also lifted up.
MESSAGE.Translation: The cat, holding onto the grass with its forepaws, was also lifted up.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「こんじょー、こんじょー」
何かエールを送ってるぞ…。
MESSAGE.EN: She was cheering for the cat...
MESSAGE.Translation: She was cheering for the cat...

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「足ぷるぷるしてるぞ」
あ、ほんとだ。
`鈴@「後ろ足がぷるぷるしてるな…すごいな五十六」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Your hind legs are really wiggling... That's awesome, Isoroku!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Your hind legs are really wiggling... That's awesome, Isoroku!❞

MESSAGE.JP: にゃ…にゃにゃっ…。
`鈴@「がんばれー。史上初の二足歩行だっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Keep it up! Be the first upright-walking cat!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Keep it up! Be the first upright-walking cat!❞

MESSAGE.JP: ぽて。
MESSAGE.EN: But his forefeet landed on the ground.
MESSAGE.Translation: But his forefeet landed on the ground.

MESSAGE.JP: にゃにゃ。ごろごろ。
MESSAGE.EN: Meow, meow. He started rolling around.
MESSAGE.Translation: Meow, meow. He started rolling around.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「どーでもよくなったなおまえ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝You seem to have lost all interest...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝You seem to have lost all interest...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「まぁいい。次。ってまた虎猫か。いいけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Fine. Next. Huh, another tabby cat? All right, fine.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Fine. Next. Huh, another tabby cat? All right, fine.❞

MESSAGE.JP: びょんびょん。
`鈴@「…なんだおまえも遊んで欲しいのか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝...You wanna play with me as well?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝...You wanna play with me as well?❞

MESSAGE.JP: ふみゃー。
人差し指に茶白猫が頭を撫でつけている。
MESSAGE.EN: It was a white-brown cat. It seemed like he wanted her to pet his head.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was a white-brown cat. It seemed like he wanted her to pet his head.

MESSAGE.JP: 猫じゃらしを動かしながら、鈴は茶白猫のひげを指先でくるくる弄った。
MESSAGE.EN: While swinging the grass, she was playing with his whiskers.
MESSAGE.Translation: While swinging the grass, she was playing with his whiskers.

MESSAGE.JP: ふにゃふにゃ。
猫も合わせて顔をぐるぐる回している。
MESSAGE.EN: The cat was also turning his head around, following its movement.
MESSAGE.Translation: The cat was also turning his head around, following its movement.

MESSAGE.JP: 時々頬をつついたりしている。
MESSAGE.EN: She occasionally poked at his cheek.
MESSAGE.Translation: She occasionally poked at his cheek.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「びょんびょん…ふにふに…」
`鈴@「びょふびょふ…」
新しい擬音を生み出している…。
MESSAGE.EN: She just made up a new mimetic word...
MESSAGE.Translation: She just made up a new mimetic word...

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴が体を震わせた。
`鈴@「こ、こら」
かぷかぷ、と猫が人差し指を甘咬みしている。
`鈴@「おまえ、あたしの指はおいしくないぞ…」
にゃふにゃふ。
`鈴@「…口にあたる感触がおもしろいのか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝...You like nibbling my finger? Is it interesting?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝...You like nibbling my finger? Is it interesting?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「変わった趣味だなおまえ…」
咥えられた指を上下に軽く動かす鈴。
MESSAGE.EN: She moved her nibbled finger up and down.
MESSAGE.Translation: She moved her nibbled finger up and down.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「んっ…ん…ぁ…」
眉根を一瞬寄せた鈴。
小首をかしげて言った。
MESSAGE.EN: Leaning her head to one side, she said.
MESSAGE.Translation: Leaning her head to one side, she said.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「なんか気持ちいいぞこれ…」
`鈴@「まさか指圧師なのかおまえ…」
`鈴@「さすがだな…テヅカ」
そろそろ声をかけよう。
MESSAGE.EN: I should call out to her soon.
MESSAGE.Translation: I should call out to her soon.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「鈴、日直なのに、遊んでたらダメだろ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Rin, you're on class duty today. No time to play with them.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Rin, you're on class duty today. No time to play with them.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 寄っていってそう言うと、彼女は立ち上がり、こちらを睨みつけた。
MESSAGE.EN: I said, getting closer to her. She got to her feet and gave me a fierce look.
MESSAGE.Translation: I said, getting closer to her. She got to her feet and gave me a fierce look.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「遊んでなんかない」
その手に持つ猫じゃらしを後ろに隠す。そこへみゃーみゃーと猫が集中する。
MESSAGE.EN: She hid the bristlegrass behind her back. The cats started gathering behind her.
MESSAGE.Translation: She hid the bristlegrass behind her back. The cats started gathering behind her.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「叱ってたんだ」
`理樹@「猫を？」
`鈴@「うん」
`理樹@「どうして」
`鈴@「ファーブルとヒットラーが喧嘩してたから」
`理樹@「そりゃまた穏やかじゃないねぇ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You sure have your hands full like always.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You sure have your hands full like always.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 見え見えの嘘だったし、それが本当だとしてもいいわけとして成り立たない。
MESSAGE.EN: Of course I knew she was lying. That aside, it would be a bad excuse even if it were true.
MESSAGE.Translation: Of course I knew she was lying. That aside, it would be a bad excuse even if it were true.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「何度言っても聞かない。こいつら馬鹿だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝They don't listen to anything I say. They must be stupid cats.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝They don't listen to anything I say. They must be stupid cats.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「鈴、日直なのに、遊んでたらダメだろ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Rin, you're on class duty today. No time to play with them.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Rin, you're on class duty today. No time to play with them.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 寄っていってそう言うと、彼女は立ち上がり、こちらを睨みつけた。
MESSAGE.EN: I said, getting closer to her. She got to her feet and gave me a fierce look.
MESSAGE.Translation: I said, getting closer to her. She got to her feet and gave me a fierce look.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「遊んでなんかない」
`鈴@「叱ってたんだ」
`理樹@「猫を？」
`鈴@「うん」
`理樹@「どうして」
`鈴@「ファーブルとヒットラーが喧嘩してたから」
`理樹@「そりゃまた穏やかじゃないねぇ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You sure have your hands full like always.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You sure have your hands full like always.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 猫の名前であることはわかっていたが、響きだけでおののいてしまう。
MESSAGE.EN: Although I knew Hitler and Fabre were the names of her cats, I shuddered at hearing them.
MESSAGE.Translation: Although I knew Hitler and Fabre were the names of her cats, I shuddered at hearing them.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「何度言っても聞かない。こいつら馬鹿だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝They don't listen to anything I say. They must be stupid cats.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝They don't listen to anything I say. They must be stupid cats.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「こら、ヒットラー！」
猫が彼女の手から逃げ、それを追おうとした。
MESSAGE.EN: The cat escaped from Rin's hold, and she made to give chase.
MESSAGE.Translation: The cat escaped from Rin's hold, and she made to give chase.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕はその肩を掴む。
僕にとっては、鈴のほうが猫みたいなものだ。
MESSAGE.EN: If you ask me, she is more cat-like than the cats themselves.
MESSAGE.Translation: If you ask me, she is more cat-like than the cats themselves.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、最初に言ったでしょ。鈴、日直だって」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You forgot? I told you that you have work to do in the classroom today.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You forgot? I told you that you have work to do in the classroom today.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「そんなこと、どうでもいい」
`理樹@「どうでもよくないよ」
`鈴@「どうして」
`理樹@「そういう役目をちゃんと果たしていかないと、鈴、クラスから浮いていくよ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝If you don't take care of your duties, they'll treat you as an irresponsible person.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝If you don't take care of your duties, they'll treat you as an irresponsible person.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「女子ともあんまり仲よくないでしょ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You aren't getting along with the other girls, are you?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You aren't getting along with the other girls, are you?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「そんなことない」
`理樹@「え？　誰か仲のいい女子いたっけ？」
`鈴@「後ろの席の子」
`理樹@「あ、そうなんだ。なんて名前の子だっけ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ah, I didn't know that. What's her name?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ah, I didn't know that. What's her name?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「知らないの？」
`理樹@「それで仲がいいってよく言えたね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝So much for getting along with her...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝So much for getting along with her...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「うるさい、だまれっ」
`鈴@「友達いなくて悪いか、おまえに迷惑かけてるかっ、それでおまえ、死ぬのかっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Is it a problem that I don't have any friends? Does that bother you? Will it kill you!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Is it a problem that I don't have any friends? Does that bother you? Will it kill you!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、悪くないし、迷惑もかかってないし、死にもしないけどさ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, it's not a problem, it's not bothering me, and it won't kill me...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, it's not a problem, it's not bothering me, and it won't kill me...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「でも心配なんだよ、鈴のことが」
`理樹@「二年はたまたまみんな一緒のクラスになったから、いいけどさ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝We're in the same class now, so there's no problem yet...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝We're in the same class now, so there's no problem yet...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「この先、鈴ひとりになったときにさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But we'll have to separate some day.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But we'll have to separate some day.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「就職してさ、そんなだったら、まずいと思うよ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It'll be bad if things continue like this when you find yourself a job.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It'll be bad if things continue like this when you find yourself a job.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ボーイフレンドも見つからないよ」
`鈴@「しね、ばーか」
`鈴@「と、レノンが言ってる」
一匹の猫を指さす。
`理樹@「あ、そ…」
教室に戻ってくると、黒板は綺麗になっていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Upon returning to the classroom, I found the blackboard erased.
MESSAGE.Translation: Upon returning to the classroom, I found the blackboard erased.

MESSAGE.JP: 席にはいつの間にか、鈴の姿が。
MESSAGE.EN: And I saw Rin sitting at her desk.
MESSAGE.Translation: And I saw Rin sitting at her desk.

MESSAGE.JP: 役目は果たし終えたという顔だった。
MESSAGE.EN: Sure enough, it looked like she'd finished her job.
MESSAGE.Translation: Sure enough, it looked like she'd finished her job.

MESSAGE.JP: 結局黒板は僕が消した。
MESSAGE.EN: I ended up erasing the blackboard myself.
MESSAGE.Translation: I ended up erasing the blackboard myself.

MESSAGE.JP: 授業が終わり放課後となる。
MESSAGE.EN: The classes finally drew to a close.
MESSAGE.Translation: The classes finally drew to a close.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「やっと終わった…」
`真人@「授業受けるだけで、へばってるのか。体力のない奴め」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝You're tired already? You have no strength.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝You're tired already? You have no strength.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「真人はもう内申捨ててるからいいよね、１８５３年にあった出来事、『火星と戦争』って、すごいね、尊敬するよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I envy you, Masato. Your answer to the question ❛What happened in 1853?❜ was ❛A war broke out between Mars and Earth.❜❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I envy you, Masato. Your answer to the question ❛What happened in 1853?❜ was ❛A war broke out between Mars and Earth.❜❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「ありがとよ」
その時の教師の唖然とした顔は、しばらく忘れられそうもない。
MESSAGE.EN: I'll never forget the history teacher's face when he heard the answer.
MESSAGE.Translation: I'll never forget the history teacher's face when he heard the answer.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「で、今日は、これからどうすればいいんだ？」
真人が考えながら僕と目を合わせる。
MESSAGE.EN: While thinking about what to do, Masato's eyes met mine.
MESSAGE.Translation: While thinking about what to do, Masato's eyes met mine.

MESSAGE.JP: 朝の恭介の提案を思い出す。
MESSAGE.EN: We remembered what Kyousuke had said this morning.
MESSAGE.Translation: We remembered what Kyousuke had said this morning.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…野球？」
`真人@「とにかく、恭介を迎えにいっか」
`真人@「謙吾、鈴っ」
すでに半分ぐらいの生徒がいない教室内を見渡したところ、鈴は見つかったが、謙吾の姿はなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: Looking around the half empty classroom, we found Rin, but not Kengo.
MESSAGE.Translation: Looking around the half empty classroom, we found Rin, but not Kengo.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「まあ、謙吾が、そんなもののために待つはずもなく」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Actually, I can't imagine he'd wait for us.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Actually, I can't imagine he'd wait for us.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「まーな。とりあえず鈴確保」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝True that. But at least we got Rin.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝True that. But at least we got Rin.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人が、鞄を抱きしめて佇む鈴の肩をつかむ。
`鈴@「うわ、馬鹿がうつる！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Uwa, don't infect me with your stupidity!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Uwa, don't infect me with your stupidity!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「ふかーっ！」
じたばたするも、屈強な腕からは逃れられない。
MESSAGE.EN: She struggled to free herself from his grip, but couldn't escape his muscled arm.
MESSAGE.Translation: She struggled to free herself from his grip, but couldn't escape his muscled arm.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「じゃ、参りましょうか」
放課後なのに、恭介の教室は、いやに静かに感じた。
MESSAGE.EN: Although school was over, Kyousuke's classroom was shrouded in silence.
MESSAGE.Translation: Although school was over, Kyousuke's classroom was shrouded in silence.

MESSAGE.JP: それは恭介が読書にふけっているせいだ。
MESSAGE.EN: I guess that's simply because Kyousuke was reading.
MESSAGE.Translation: I guess that's simply because Kyousuke was reading.

MESSAGE.JP: その姿は、他のクラスから女子が見物に訪れるほど、なんていうか…神聖なものだった。
MESSAGE.EN: Girls from other classes kept coming over to watch him. He looked, how to put it... like something holy.
MESSAGE.Translation: Girls from other classes kept coming over to watch him. He looked, how to put it... like something holy.

MESSAGE.JP: 彼が目を伏せて、ページをめくる姿、それはとても絵になった。
MESSAGE.EN: He looked down at his book and turned a page. It was a picture perfect moment.
MESSAGE.Translation: He looked down at his book and turned a page. It was a picture perfect moment.

MESSAGE.JP: でも、なにより見守りたいと思わせるのは、彼の童心だ。
MESSAGE.EN: But what I wanted to watch above all was nothing but his childlike innocence.
MESSAGE.Translation: But what I wanted to watch above all was nothing but his childlike innocence.

MESSAGE.JP: 物語に感化され、笑い、怒り、時に泣く、その純真無垢な感情だ。
MESSAGE.EN: While reading, all his emotions are clearly visible on his face: happiness, anger and sometimes sadness.
MESSAGE.Translation: While reading, all his emotions are clearly visible on his face: happiness, anger and sometimes sadness.

MESSAGE.JP: そういう意味で、読書をしている時の恭介は、魅力的なのだ。
MESSAGE.EN: In that way, Kyousuke is charming when he's reading.
MESSAGE.Translation: In that way, Kyousuke is charming when he's reading.

MESSAGE.JP: 笑う。
少年のように。
彼はいつまでその童心を守っていけるのだろうか。
MESSAGE.EN: Will he always keep his pure heart?
MESSAGE.Translation: Will he always keep his pure heart?

MESSAGE.JP: ちなみに、恭介が読むのは、子供向けの漫画雑誌だけだ。
MESSAGE.EN: By the way, Kyousuke reads only manga magazines for kids.
MESSAGE.Translation: By the way, Kyousuke reads only manga magazines for kids.

MESSAGE.JP: ようやく放課後になっていることに気づいたのか、顔を上げて時間を確かめた後、雑誌を閉ざした。
MESSAGE.EN: Finally noticing that school had finished, he glanced at the clock and closed the magazine.
MESSAGE.Translation: Finally noticing that school had finished, he glanced at the clock and closed the magazine.

MESSAGE.JP: それと同時に教室内に、放課後のざわめきが戻る。
MESSAGE.EN: At the same time, the stillness was broken.
MESSAGE.Translation: At the same time, the stillness was broken.

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介が僕たちを認めて歩いてくる。
MESSAGE.EN: Taking note of our presence, Kyousuke walked toward us.
MESSAGE.Translation: Taking note of our presence, Kyousuke walked toward us.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「バンドをしよう」
`恭介@「バンド名は…リトルバスターズだ」
ずだんっ！
僕と真人は同時にひっくり返る。
MESSAGE.EN: Masato and I fell down together.
MESSAGE.Translation: Masato and I fell down together.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「待て、野球じゃなかったのか…？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Wait! Didn't you say we were going to play baseball...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Wait! Didn't you say we were going to play baseball...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「え？　そうだったか？」
`恭介@「ああ…悪い。そうだったな、野球だ。今読んでた漫画がバンドものだったから感化されちまったぜ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Oh... sorry. Yeah, baseball. The manga I just read was one about a rock band, so I was just influenced.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Oh... sorry. Yeah, baseball. The manga I just read was one about a rock band, so I was just influenced.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「おまえ、なんでもいいんだろ」
`恭介@「んなこたねぇーよ、野球だよ、安心しろ、鈴」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Of course not, baseball it is. Don't worry, Rin.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Of course not, baseball it is. Don't worry, Rin.❞

MESSAGE.JP: その頭を撫でるが、鈴はうっとうしいとばかりに顔をぷるぷる振るった。
MESSAGE.EN: He patted her head, but it seemed to annoy her.
MESSAGE.Translation: He patted her head, but it seemed to annoy her.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「で、やっぱ謙吾はいないのか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝So, Kengo isn't with you, of course?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝So, Kengo isn't with you, of course?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「部活あるからねぇ」
`恭介@「まぁいい。そのうちあいつもわかってくれるさ」
なにを？と目を見合わせる僕たちを残して、恭介は廊下を歩いていく。
MESSAGE.EN: Understand what? We exchanged glances as Kyousuke strode into the corridor.
MESSAGE.Translation: Understand what? We exchanged glances as Kyousuke strode into the corridor.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「ほら、おまえら、いくぞっ」
そう振り返りもせず、促した。
MESSAGE.EN: Not even turning around, he just kept walking.
MESSAGE.Translation: Not even turning around, he just kept walking.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「どこに？」
`恭介@「部室」
僕たちは、野球部の部室にやってきていた。
MESSAGE.EN: We arrived at the baseball clubroom.
MESSAGE.Translation: We arrived at the baseball clubroom.

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介は躊躇することなく戸を開け、中に踏み込んでいく。
MESSAGE.EN: Without any hesitation, Kyousuke opened the door and stepped inside.
MESSAGE.Translation: Without any hesitation, Kyousuke opened the door and stepped inside.

MESSAGE.JP: 中はしばらく掃除していないのか、荒れ放題だった。
MESSAGE.EN: The interior had not been cleaned in a while; frankly, it was a mess.
MESSAGE.Translation: The interior had not been cleaned in a while; frankly, it was a mess.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ひどい有様だねぇ…」
`恭介@「一応二年の部員は何人かいるらしいが、なにやらごたごたがあったそうで、新入部員がいないらしい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝They say there are still a few club members, but they've had some problems and failed to get any new members.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝They say there are still a few club members, but they've had some problems and failed to get any new members.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「で、連中の留守のこの期間、使わしてもらおうというわけだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝That's why I've decided to borrow this room in their absence.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝That's why I've decided to borrow this room in their absence.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「早い話が、乗っ取るってわけだな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝In a word, you simply hijacked it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝In a word, you simply hijacked it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ちょっとの間だけね」
`恭介@「とりあえず掃除でもして、チーム結成祝いだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Anyway, we have to clean up the room first and celebrate the formation of our team.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Anyway, we have to clean up the room first and celebrate the formation of our team.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ふぅ…これ以上はきれいになりそうもないね」
`恭介@「ま、いいだろ」
`真人@「ところで、人が減ってないか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝By the way, didn't we lose someone?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝By the way, didn't we lose someone?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ああ、鈴なら、僕に雑巾とモップ渡して帰ったけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝If you mean Rin, she handed me this mop and went to her room.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝If you mean Rin, she handed me this mop and went to her room.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「なんだとおぉーーっ！」
`真人@「おまえ、なんで止めねーんだよっ、三人で野球ができるかよっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Why didn't you stop her? How can we play baseball with just three people!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Why didn't you stop her? How can we play baseball with just three people!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、ぜんぜん乗り気じゃなかったし…それに、四人でもできないけどさ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝She had absolutely no interest in it... Besides, four people isn't enough either...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝She had absolutely no interest in it... Besides, four people isn't enough either...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「どうすんだよ、恭介」
`恭介@「ふん…俺を見くびるな…」
`真人@「なんだよ、さすがだな、打つ手があんのか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝That's our Kyousuke. You already had something in mind?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝That's our Kyousuke. You already had something in mind?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「三人でやる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝We'll play with just the three of us.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝We'll play with just the three of us.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹＆真人@「えー」
なぜか延々とノックを受けるはめに。
`理樹@「真人までいなくなったよ」
`恭介@「俺を見くびるな…」
`恭介@「ふたりでやる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝We'll play with just the two of us!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝We'll play with just the two of us!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「えー」
ノックはふたりきりで続いていった…。
MESSAGE.EN: We ended up training until late.
MESSAGE.Translation: We ended up training until late.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「なんだ？」
`恭介@「おまえら、なんで就職活動で忙しい俺が一番一生懸命なんだよっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝You guys, why am I trying my hardest here despite being the busiest with job hunting!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝You guys, why am I trying my hardest here despite being the busiest with job hunting!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「いや、そんな一方的にキレられても…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Hey, why are you pissed off so suddenly...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Hey, why are you pissed off so suddenly...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「理樹を見習え、俺のノックを受け続けて、見ろ、泥だらけだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Look at Riki! He practiced very hard with me till he was covered with mud!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Look at Riki! He practiced very hard with me till he was covered with mud!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「それはなんだ…？　哀れめばいいのか…？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝What are you trying to say? Should we pity him...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝What are you trying to say? Should we pity him...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「ふたりが発案者なんだから続けるのは結構だが、部活で忙しい人間まで巻き込んでもらいたくないな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝You two came up with that idea, so you can keep going at it, but don't get those who're busy with club activities involved.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝You two came up with that idea, so you can keep going at it, but don't get those who're busy with club activities involved.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「なんだよてめぇ…部活もやってねぇ筋肉馬鹿は暇だろうから、球拾いがお似合いだってかっっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝What, you're saying ❛this Muscle Idiot who didn't even join any clubs must have a whole lot of free time, so fetching balls is a role befitting of him❜!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝What, you're saying ❛this Muscle Idiot who didn't even join any clubs must have a whole lot of free time, so fetching balls is a role befitting of him❜!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「真人の言いがかりって、ときにお金を払ってまで見たくなるほど素晴らしい言いがかりだよね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Sometimes I really wanna pay you for your amazing comebacks, Masato...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Sometimes I really wanna pay you for your amazing comebacks, Masato...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「ありがとよ」
`鈴@「こいつばかだ！」
鈴が新種の生き物でも見つけたかのように見る。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin watched Masato as if she'd discovered a new species of animal.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin watched Masato as if she'd discovered a new species of animal.

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「そもそも、どうして野球なんだ」
混乱した場を仕切り直すように謙吾が問う。
`恭介@「そうか、それを言ってなかったな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Oh, I totally forgot to tell you that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Oh, I totally forgot to tell you that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「ちなみに何も聞いていない」
`恭介@「俺はここんとこずっと就職活動に奔走してるけどさ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝As you know, I'm really busy with job hunting right now...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝As you know, I'm really busy with job hunting right now...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「ふと、なにやってるんだろう、って思う時がある」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝But I sometimes wonder why I'm doing such a thing.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝But I sometimes wonder why I'm doing such a thing.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「これから$K91サラリーマン$K0としてあくせく働いていくんだろうな…それだけはわかる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝I'm going to work as a $K91salaryman$K0 from here on... That's all I know.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝I'm going to work as a $K91salaryman$K0 from here on... That's all I know.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「でも、それはなんだか流されてるな、という気がしたんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝However, I've realized that this isn't by my own will.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝However, I've realized that this isn't by my own will.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「周りがそうし始めてるから、自分もなんとなくそうしようってだけだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Everybody's looking for their job, so I've also got to do that...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Everybody's looking for their job, so I've also got to do that...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「そこには自分がいない。自分自身というものがない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝It's not my own thing. It's not something that truly belongs to me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝It's not my own thing. It's not something that truly belongs to me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「体だけあっても、中身はからっぽの人形のようじゃないか。そうは思わないか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Even if there's a body, if the insides are hollow it's nothing but a puppet. Don't you think so?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Even if there's a body, if the insides are hollow it's nothing but a puppet. Don't you think so?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「まぁ、なんとなくはわかるが…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Well, I kind of understand where you're going with this...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Well, I kind of understand where you're going with this...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「だから、俺は俺であり、そして俺がここにいることを証明し続けるため…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Then I realized I have to do something to prove that I am me and that I am here...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Then I realized I have to do something to prove that I am me and that I am here...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「野球をやることにした」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝That's why I've decided to play baseball.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝That's why I've decided to play baseball.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「ありゃ？　途中まで理解できていたつもりなのに、最後の部分だけ理解できなかったぞ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Hmm? I was following up to a point, but I didn't get that last bit.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Hmm? I was following up to a point, but I didn't get that last bit.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「ああ…奇遇だな…俺もよく似た感想だ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Yeah... An unexpected conclusion... My impression is similar to yours...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Yeah... An unexpected conclusion... My impression is similar to yours...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「悪いが、恭介、最後の部分だけもう一度、言ってみてくれないか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Sorry, Kyousuke, but could you repeat that last line one more time?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Sorry, Kyousuke, but could you repeat that last line one more time?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「俺は俺であり続けるため、野球をする」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝I'll play baseball to continue being myself.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝I'll play baseball to continue being myself.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「えーと…」
真人が目頭を指で押さえてしばらく考え込む。
MESSAGE.EN: Masato pondered while tapping his temple.
MESSAGE.Translation: Masato pondered while tapping his temple.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「そこでどうして野球が…？」
最大の謎を訊いた。
`恭介@「考えてもみろよ」
`恭介@「就職活動中に野球をしようなんて誰が考えるんだ？　普通思わないだろ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Who would consider playing baseball while they're hunting for a job? It doesn't normally happen.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Who would consider playing baseball while they're hunting for a job? It doesn't normally happen.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「まぁ、そりゃ…」
`恭介@「しかも、人数集めてさ…就職活動中じゃなくてもなかなかそんな気にはなれない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Yeah, but that's not all there is to it. Even without job hunting, having to gather several people for the team is a hassle in itself.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Yeah, but that's not all there is to it. Even without job hunting, having to gather several people for the team is a hassle in itself.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「なれるか？」
`真人@「いや、まあ、なれないが…」
`恭介@「だろ」
`恭介@「だからこそ、俺は野球をすることにしたんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝And that's precisely why I've chosen baseball.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝And that's precisely why I've chosen baseball.❞

MESSAGE.JP: …なんだ、この説得力は。
こうして僕らは、恭介に丸め込まれていくんだ…。
MESSAGE.EN: There's no way we can escape his eloquence...
MESSAGE.Translation: There's no way we can escape his eloquence...

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「だとしてもだ…」
そうはさせまいと真人が切り込む。
`真人@「それじゃ、オレたちは単なる巻き添えじゃねぇか」
`恭介@「いや、おまえたちも同じだろ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝No, there's no difference between you guys and me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝No, there's no difference between you guys and me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「試験勉強や課題に追われる日々の中で、野球をするなんて思いもしなかったはずだ。それはおまえが今さっき同意しただろ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝In the midst of life that has you studying for exams and doing homework, have you ever imagined yourself suddenly starting to play baseball?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝In the midst of life that has you studying for exams and doing homework, have you ever imagined yourself suddenly starting to play baseball?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「いや、でも野球なら普通に体育の時間にやってるんだが…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝No. But we often play it in P.E. class...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝No. But we often play it in P.E. class...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「授業のような主体性のないものでやったとして、なんの意味がある？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝In class, there's no independence or identity. What meaning is there in it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝In class, there's no independence or identity. What meaning is there in it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「自らの意志で、投げて走って打ち歓喜する、そのことに意味がある。違うか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝But if you're doing it of your own free will, you'll feel delighted in throwing, running, and hitting. That's what's meaningful; am I wrong?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝But if you're doing it of your own free will, you'll feel delighted in throwing, running, and hitting. That's what's meaningful; am I wrong?❞

MESSAGE.JP: …誰も何も言い返せなくなる。
ただひとりを除いては。
`謙吾@「俺は…」
謙吾が席を立つ。
MESSAGE.EN: Kengo got up from his chair.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kengo got up from his chair.

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「自らの意志で、剣を振るっている。ではな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝I practice kendo of my own free will. See you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝I practice kendo of my own free will. See you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: そのまま背を向け、食堂を出ていった。
MESSAGE.EN: He turned his back on us and left the cafeteria.
MESSAGE.Translation: He turned his back on us and left the cafeteria.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「謙吾っ」
`恭介@「放っておけ、理樹」
`恭介@「…あいつも理解してくれる日がくるさ」
`真人@「いや、オレたちですらまったく理解してないんだが」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝It's not like we really understand anything either.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝It's not like we really understand anything either.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「ありゃ、そーなの」
`恭介@「理樹は」
恭介の目が僕を射抜く。
MESSAGE.EN: Kyousuke gave me a penetrating look.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kyousuke gave me a penetrating look.

MESSAGE.JP: そんな目で見られて、否定できるはずはない。
MESSAGE.EN: There's just no way you can say ❛no❜ to those eyes.
MESSAGE.Translation: There's just no way you can say ❛no❜ to those eyes.

MESSAGE.JP: そもそも…
僕と恭介の心が触れあったから、こうなってるわけで。
MESSAGE.EN: the reason it came to this was because my heart and Kyousuke's had resonated.
MESSAGE.Translation: the reason it came to this was because my heart and Kyousuke's had resonated.

MESSAGE.JP: ただ…野球とは思いもしなかったけど。
MESSAGE.EN: However, I'd never have thought we would start playing baseball.
MESSAGE.Translation: However, I'd never have thought we would start playing baseball.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「僕は…そもそも僕が言い出したことだし」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'm in... since I was the one who said we should do something in the first place.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'm in... since I was the one who said we should do something in the first place.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「理樹は単純だからな」
`理樹@「なんだよ、だからなんだってんだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What? What are you trying to say?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What? What are you trying to say?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「利用されてる」
`鈴@「きょーすけの…」
`鈴@「ふかーっ!!」
`鈴@「きょーすけの暇つぶしに」
`理樹@「恭介は忙しいはずだよ」
でも…
そんな恭介だからこそ、僕は頼ったのかもしれない。
MESSAGE.EN: I believed in Kyousuke since it was him.
MESSAGE.Translation: I believed in Kyousuke since it was him.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は勉強のことなんて忘れて、ただ遊びたいだけなのかもしれない。
MESSAGE.EN: It could be that I just want to forget about studying and play around with him.
MESSAGE.Translation: It could be that I just want to forget about studying and play around with him.

MESSAGE.JP: 自分を、そんな無規律な人間とは考えたくないけど。
MESSAGE.EN: Of course, I didn't want to think of myself as being so indolent, but...
MESSAGE.Translation: Of course, I didn't want to think of myself as being so indolent, but...

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「みんなばかだ」
`恭介@「あー、どうせ馬鹿さ」
まったく厭わないといった様子で、恭介は夕飯に箸をつけ始めた。
MESSAGE.EN: Unfazed by her words, Kyousuke began eating his dinner.
MESSAGE.Translation: Unfazed by her words, Kyousuke began eating his dinner.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「ったく、誰のせいだよ…」
部屋に戻ってきてから、真人はベッドに転がってそうぼやく。
MESSAGE.EN: After we had returned to our room, Masato grumbled, lying on his bed.
MESSAGE.Translation: After we had returned to our room, Masato grumbled, lying on his bed.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、野球することになるなんてまったく予想できなかったからさ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I never thought Kyousuke would choose baseball...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I never thought Kyousuke would choose baseball...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「予想つかないことをおっぱじめるのがあいつなんだよ…それぐらい予想しろ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝He's one to propose the unexpected... You should've at least predicted that much.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝He's one to propose the unexpected... You should've at least predicted that much.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「つまりそれ、予想つかないってことじゃん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It's unexpected... because it's impossible to predict...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It's unexpected... because it's impossible to predict...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「オレは強くなることにしか興味ねぇんだよ、野球なんてスポーティなスポーツやってられるかよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝I'm only interested in becoming stronger. Why do I have to play a sporty sport like baseball?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝I'm only interested in becoming stronger. Why do I have to play a sporty sport like baseball?❞

MESSAGE.JP: スポーティじゃないスポーツってなんだろう…陸上とかだろうか。
MESSAGE.EN: What's a non-sporty sport... an athletic sport or something?
MESSAGE.Translation: What's a non-sporty sport... an athletic sport or something?

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「真人って、ハンマー投げとか向いてそうじゃない？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Why don't you look into something like the hammer throw?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Why don't you look into something like the hammer throw?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「なんだよ、その筋肉はせいぜい球を遠くに飛ばすことぐらいしか能がなさそうですねぇ、とでもいいたげだなっ、あぁ!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝What, this Muscle is so inept that he's only good for throwing balls into the distance, is that what you're thinking, huh!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝What, this Muscle is so inept that he's only good for throwing balls into the distance, is that what you're thinking, huh!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、そんなことぜんぜん思ってないし…（みごとな言いがかりだっ）」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, I wasn't thinking that at all... (What amazing comebacks!)❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, I wasn't thinking that at all... (What amazing comebacks!)❞

MESSAGE.JP: 思わずお代を払ってしまいそうになる。
MESSAGE.EN: I was about to pay him.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was about to pay him.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「ふんっ…」
真人が起きあがり、ベッドから降りてくる。
MESSAGE.EN: Masato got up and stepped down from his bed.
MESSAGE.Translation: Masato got up and stepped down from his bed.

MESSAGE.JP: そのまま部屋を出て行こうとするから、僕は呼び止める。
MESSAGE.EN: He tried to go straight out of the room, but I called out to stop him.
MESSAGE.Translation: He tried to go straight out of the room, but I called out to stop him.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「どこいくのさ」
`真人@「走ってくる」
`理樹@「課題はしないでいいの？」
`真人@「え、なんだっけ」
`理樹@「三科目も出てるんだから、ひとつぐらい覚えていてもよさそうなものなのに」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Three subjects. You forgot about all of them?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Three subjects. You forgot about all of them?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「いつもの頼む」
`理樹@「なんだよ、その常連のような厚かましい頼みかた」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝How impudent can you get, asking me to do it again.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝How impudent can you get, asking me to do it again.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「少し筋肉やるから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝I'll give you a little bit of my muscle.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝I'll give you a little bit of my muscle.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、いらないし、もらえないから」
`真人@「…ちっ」
舌打ちして、自分の机からノートを持ってくると、部屋の中央に特設されたちゃぶ台の前に座り込む。
MESSAGE.EN: He clicked his tongue and took a notebook from his desk, seating himself in front of the low table at the center of the room.
MESSAGE.Translation: He clicked his tongue and took a notebook from his desk, seating himself in front of the low table at the center of the room.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「写す気まんまんじゃん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You're gonna copy my answers, aren't you...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You're gonna copy my answers, aren't you...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「こっちのほうが集中できんだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝No, I can just concentrate better here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝No, I can just concentrate better here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「じゃ、僕は自分の机でするよ」
`真人@「なんだと、てめぇ…この筋肉を目の前に勉強なんて暑苦しくてやってられませんってかよっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝What!? Are you saying you don't wanna do homework with these muscles because they make you suffocate!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝What!? Are you saying you don't wanna do homework with these muscles because they make you suffocate!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、そんなことぜんぜん思ってないし…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, I wasn't thinking that at all...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, I wasn't thinking that at all...❞

MESSAGE.JP: すごいぞ、真人、そんなふうにこじつけられるのか！
MESSAGE.EN: Amazing, Masato, I never imagined you could interpret it like that!
MESSAGE.Translation: Amazing, Masato, I never imagined you could interpret it like that!

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「じゃあ、こっちでしろよ。でねぇとこのちゃぶ台どけて、アブシリーズ揃えに入るぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Well, let's do it like this then. Or else I'll move this low table aside and get on the ab machine.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Well, let's do it like this then. Or else I'll move this low table aside and get on the ab machine.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「それはやばいね…阻止しなきゃ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That would be a horrible sight... I can't let it happen.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That would be a horrible sight... I can't let it happen.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 仕方なく、同じちゃぶ台で課題に取り組むことに。
MESSAGE.EN: So, I ended up using the table.
MESSAGE.Translation: So, I ended up using the table.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「んあー、あ…ほぅほぅ…」
`理樹@「おもいっきり、見てるよねぇ…」
`恭介@「よぅ」
いきなりドアが開いて恭介が顔を覗かせていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Suddenly the door opened, and Kyousuke appeared.
MESSAGE.Translation: Suddenly the door opened, and Kyousuke appeared.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「なんだよ、また野球のお誘いか？」
`恭介@「いや、違う。今日出た課題でやっかいなのがあるんだよ、助けてくれ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Nope. I've got some difficult homework. Help me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Nope. I've got some difficult homework. Help me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 断りもなく入ってくる。
`真人@「なんで二年のオレたちに相談してくんだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Why ask us? We're only second years.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Why ask us? We're only second years.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「何をさせたいのかよくわからないが、偉人の言葉を集めろって課題でさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝I don't know what the teacher is thinking, but I have to collect the words of great people.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝I don't know what the teacher is thinking, but I have to collect the words of great people.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「名言ってこと？」
`恭介@「そそ、それそれ」
`真人@「猫も棒から落ちる」
`理樹@「それことわざだよ、しかも奇跡的に間違ってるし」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That's a proverb, and you miraculously got it wrong.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That's a proverb, and you miraculously got it wrong.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「真面目に集めるなら、図書館いったほうが早いでしょ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝If you're serious about it, why not go to the library?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝If you're serious about it, why not go to the library?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「いや、真面目にやる気がないからここにきたんだよ。おまえらが口にした言葉から探す」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Nah, I'm not serious, so I'm here. All I need are your words.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Nah, I'm not serious, so I'm here. All I need are your words.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「で、さっきのもらい」
`恭介@「今ここに、新しい名言が生まれた…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝We've just witnessed the birth of a new aphorism...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝We've just witnessed the birth of a new aphorism...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「これ明日授業で発表するから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝I'll use this for the class presentation tomorrow.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝I'll use this for the class presentation tomorrow.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「うおおぉぉーーーっ！」
`理樹@「馬鹿丸出しだね…」
`真人@「待てっ、オレだけに標的を絞るな…あいつらも呼ぶ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Wait! Why should I be the only target?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Wait! Why should I be the only target?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 携帯を取り出し、仲間を呼びつける。
MESSAGE.EN: Masato took out his cellphone and called the rest of the group.
MESSAGE.Translation: Masato took out his cellphone and called the rest of the group.

MESSAGE.JP: そして、いつもの顔ぶれが僕たちの部屋に揃うことに。
MESSAGE.EN: A few minutes later, we had our regular lineup.
MESSAGE.Translation: A few minutes later, we had our regular lineup.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「あたしも課題ある」
`真人@「ここでやればいいだろ」
`鈴@「なんでこんな小汚い男子の部屋でせにゃならんのだっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Why? This room is cramped and dirty.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Why? This room is cramped and dirty.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「てめぇ、先入観でものを言うなよ…見ての通り掃除は行き届いてるぜ。理樹が力入れてんだぜ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Look carefully! There's no dust here because Riki is putting in some power for cleaning.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Look carefully! There's no dust here because Riki is putting in some power for cleaning.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「あ、それもらい」
`恭介@「今ここに、新しい名言が生まれた」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Like that, another new aphorism has been born.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Like that, another new aphorism has been born.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「うおおぉぉーーーーっ！」
`理樹@「これは正直、寒いねぇ…」
`謙吾@「くだらない…俺はいくぞ」
`真人@「待てよ、てめぇ…また逃げんのかよ」
`謙吾@「なんだ、夕べの続きでもしようってのか？　鈴にすら勝てなかった男が？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝You want to continue from yesterday? You couldn't even beat Rin.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝You want to continue from yesterday? You couldn't even beat Rin.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「てめぇ、見てたのかよっ」
`謙吾@「噂に聞いただけだ」
`真人@「ちっ…あれは武器がうなぎパイになったせいだよっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Dammit... that's because my battle weapon was an eel pie.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Dammit... that's because my battle weapon was an eel pie.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「もしそうだったとしても、いくらでも手はあったはずだ。違うか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝That may be so, but there were many more ways you could've fought. Am I wrong?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝That may be so, but there were many more ways you could've fought. Am I wrong?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「何が言いたいんだよ、てめぇ…」
`謙吾@「つまりおまえのほうが、逆にうなぎパイに食われたということさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝I mean, you were eaten by the eel pie instead.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝I mean, you were eaten by the eel pie instead.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「お、それいいな」
`謙吾@「しまったあぁぁーー！」
`恭介@「ここにまた、新しい名言が生まれた」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝And like that, yet another new aphorism has been born.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝And like that, yet another new aphorism has been born.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「不覚だぁ…この俺が、そんなわけのわからん言葉を後世に残すことになろうとは…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝What a blunder... To think I'd leave something so absurd behind...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝What a blunder... To think I'd leave something so absurd behind...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「残されたほうは、この言葉からどんな状況を想像するんだろうね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I wonder, what will future generations think when they read that...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I wonder, what will future generations think when they read that...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「調子にのって、羽目をはずしすぎだ、ばーか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝You got carried away and let yourself go, stupid.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝You got carried away and let yourself go, stupid.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「おまえらうっさい！　もっと静かにしろっ」
`真人@「てめぇひとりで課題ばっかし進めやがって…少しは羽目はずせよ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Rin, why are you doing your homework alone? Lighten up a bit!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Rin, why are you doing your homework alone? Lighten up a bit!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「恭介も、ひいきすんなよっ、鈴からも搾り取れよっ、名言をよ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝And Kyousuke, why am I your only target? Try to squeeze some from Rin!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝And Kyousuke, why am I your only target? Try to squeeze some from Rin!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「真人が勝手によじれて搾れていってるって印象だけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I think that's entirely the result of your own actions.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I think that's entirely the result of your own actions.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「くそぅっ、自爆ってことかよっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Dammit, it's like scoring an own goal.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Dammit, it's like scoring an own goal.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「こうなったらマジで名言吐いて、あの子ちょっとイケてるじゃない？ってとこ見せてやる…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Okay, since it's come to this, I'll make a bunch of great sayings and show her that I'm actually pretty cool...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Okay, since it's come to this, I'll make a bunch of great sayings and show her that I'm actually pretty cool...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「すでにそれが名言だな」
`理樹@「前向きなのか、後ろ向きなのかよくわかんないところが真人っぽいよね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I don't know if it's positive or negative, Masato, but these words are so like you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I don't know if it's positive or negative, Masato, but these words are so like you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「ありがとよ」
`鈴@「こいつ馬鹿だ！」
`恭介@「お、それももらいだ」
`真人@「うおおぉぉーーーっ、状況まで補足するなああぁぁーーーーーっ！」
`謙吾@「真人をみごとに一言で表してるな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Well done, splendidly describing him in a single sentence.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Well done, splendidly describing him in a single sentence.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「馬鹿って言ってるだけじゃねーかっ」
`鈴@「だーかーらっ、うっさいっ！」
`謙吾@「もう用はないな？　俺は戻るぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Was that all you had? I'm going back.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Was that all you had? I'm going back.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「んまっ…」
ぶすっ。
`真人@「つぁ…ちょぎっ…！」
鈴にシャーペンで脇腹を突かれながら、謙吾を呼び止めようとしたもんだから、言葉にならない。
MESSAGE.EN: Masato couldn't get the words out of his mouth, since Rin had thrust a mechanical pencil into his side.
MESSAGE.Translation: Masato couldn't get the words out of his mouth, since Rin had thrust a mechanical pencil into his side.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「また奥深い名言が生まれちまったな…」
`理樹@「彼の人生に何があったんだろう…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I wonder what happened to make him that way...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I wonder what happened to make him that way...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「ふぅむ、興味深いな」
`恭介@「対訳も載っけておこう」
`理樹@「地味な内容の割に軽快だね…」
`謙吾@「しかも状況を見ろ、こいつ、マヨネーズを空に向けて差し出しているぞ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝That's not all. Look, he's holding out a tub of mayonnaise to the sky...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝That's not all. Look, he's holding out a tub of mayonnaise to the sky...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ほんとだ…」
`鈴@「謎は深まるばかりだな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝The mystery is only getting deeper and deeper...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝The mystery is only getting deeper and deeper...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「てめぇに脇腹刺されただけだよっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝That's because you stabbed me in the side!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝That's because you stabbed me in the side!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「そういや、野球」
ようやく静かになって、みんながかりかりとノートを埋めるのに必死になっている中、恭介はぽつりと口にした。
MESSAGE.EN: After we finally quieted down and resumed our homework, Kyousuke brought it up again.
MESSAGE.Translation: After we finally quieted down and resumed our homework, Kyousuke brought it up again.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「来週末に試合するんでよろしく」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝We'll have a match at the end of next week.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝We'll have a match at the end of next week.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ぴた、とすべてのシャーペンの動きが止まり、静寂が訪れる。
MESSAGE.EN: We immediately stopped moving our pencils, and the room fell dead quiet.
MESSAGE.Translation: We immediately stopped moving our pencils, and the room fell dead quiet.

MESSAGE.JP: みんなその意味を計りかねているようだ。
MESSAGE.EN: It took some time for his words to sink in.
MESSAGE.Translation: It took some time for his words to sink in.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「いいか、恭介」
真人がその中、先陣を切る。
`真人@「…試合をするには足りないものがある」
`恭介@「なんだ？」
`真人@「そうか…わからないのか…なら教えてやろう…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝You don't know? Okay, I'll tell you...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝You don't know? Okay, I'll tell you...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「そりゃあ、残りのメンバーと、練習時間と、練習道具と、おまえ以外の人間のやる気と、残りのメンバーだよっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝We need more members, more practice, more equipment, everyone save for you needs motivation, and we need more members!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝We need more members, more practice, more equipment, everyone save for you needs motivation, and we need more members!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「こいつ残りのメンバーって二回言ったぞ」
`理樹@「真人なりに意味があるんだよ、あまり深く詮索してあげないでよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I guess he did it on purpose. There must be some deep meaning to it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I guess he did it on purpose. There must be some deep meaning to it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「意味なんてねぇーーよ、ごめんなさいでしたあぁぁー！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝I just made a mistake! I'm so sorryyyy!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝I just made a mistake! I'm so sorryyyy!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「やっぱばかだ」
`真人@「なんだとてめぇ、触りまくって馬鹿移すぞ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝What did you say, Rin!? I'm gonna infect you with my stupidity!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝What did you say, Rin!? I'm gonna infect you with my stupidity!❞

MESSAGE.JP: ばきぃ！
鈴のハイキックが炸裂する。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin gave him a high kick instead.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin gave him a high kick instead.

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「そこんとこどうなんだ、恭介」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝What are you going to do about it, Kyousuke?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝What are you going to do about it, Kyousuke?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 立ったまま白目を剥いた真人の後を謙吾が引き継ぐ。
MESSAGE.EN: Kengo took over Masato's role since he was standing still with his eyes rolled up to the whites.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kengo took over Masato's role since he was standing still with his eyes rolled up to the whites.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「練習道具はあるだろう。野球部のを使えばいい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝There's plenty of equipment. Left by the old baseball club.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝There's plenty of equipment. Left by the old baseball club.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「残りのメンバーは」
`恭介@「これから探すさ」
`謙吾@「残り５人、見つかるかな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝You need five more members. Can you make it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝You need five more members. Can you make it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 残りは４人だと思ったが、謙吾はわざと自分を抜いたんだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: I thought we needed only four more, but Kengo purposely counted himself out.
MESSAGE.Translation: I thought we needed only four more, but Kengo purposely counted himself out.

MESSAGE.JP: `猫@「ふぎゃーーーっ！」
`真人@「うぉぉ、いてぇぇーーっ！」
さらに猫に引っ掻かれ、正気を取り戻す真人。
MESSAGE.EN: With the assistance of a cat scratching him, Masato regained consciousness.
MESSAGE.Translation: With the assistance of a cat scratching him, Masato regained consciousness.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「なあ、鈴。ちょっとこい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Hey, Rin. Come here for a bit.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Hey, Rin. Come here for a bit.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人は猫に任せて、鈴が寄ってくる。
MESSAGE.EN: Leaving the cat with Masato, she approached Kyousuke.
MESSAGE.Translation: Leaving the cat with Masato, she approached Kyousuke.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「ひとつ頼まれてくれないか」
`鈴@「なにを」
`恭介@「もちろん、メンバー集めだ」
`鈴@「そんなのできない」
`恭介@「まあ、聞け。おまえこれを耳につけろ」
言って差し出すのは、手作りのイヤホンのようなもの。
MESSAGE.EN: He handed an earphone to her. It looked handmade.
MESSAGE.Translation: He handed an earphone to her. It looked handmade.

MESSAGE.JP: それを鈴の耳に装着させる。
続いて恭介は自分の携帯電話を取り出し、受話器を耳に当て、もしもし、と話しかけた。
MESSAGE.EN: Then he took out his cellphone and said ❛hello?❜ into it.
MESSAGE.Translation: Then he took out his cellphone and said ❛hello?❜ into it.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴が飛び退くぐらい驚く。
どうやら、耳のイヤホンから恭介の声が聞こえたようだ。
MESSAGE.EN: It seemed like she'd heard his voice from the earphone.
MESSAGE.Translation: It seemed like she'd heard his voice from the earphone.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「感度良好。早速任務を命ずる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Great reception. I'll assign you a mission.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Great reception. I'll assign you a mission.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「ミッション・スタート！」
`恭介@「鈴を使って、女子生徒をリトルバスターズに勧誘せよ!!」

MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝By using Rin, we'll recruit a new female member for the team!❞

`恭介@「そりゃ、男ばっかじゃむさ苦しいからに決まってるだろ」

MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝That's... of course, because it's painful with only guys.❞

`恭介@「いいじゃねーか」
`恭介@「それに…女が鈴ひとりだと寂しいだろ」

MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝And Rin won't feel lonely being the only girl.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[This is Rin. I've infiltrated the girls' dorm.]

MESSAGE.Translation: Kyousuke put his cellphone into hands-free mode and placed it on the table. We huddled around it.

MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝She probably meant that all she knows is her face...❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Ask her if she wants to play baseball, of course.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[But I don't know what to say.]

`恭介@「まずは挨拶しろ」

いや、朝じゃないし…。

MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝I see. They say, recently, girls often use ❛ohayou gozaimasu❜ as long as it's their first meeting of the day.❞

`真人@「じゃあ、別のことで興味を引くしかないな…」
`真人@「そうだな…己をひたすら鍛錬すること…つまり筋肉に興味はないか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Lemme see... Rin, ask her if she's interested in training herself... in other words, muscles.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Lemme see... Rin, ask her if she's interested in training herself... in other words, muscles.❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[You're the only sad idiot who's interested in that!]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[You're the only sad idiot who's interested in that!]

MESSAGE.JP: ツッコミが返ってくる。
`女生徒@『え…私も野球に興味なんてないですけど…』
MESSAGE.EN: `Female Student@[Eh... but I'm not really interested in baseball...]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Female Student@[Eh... but I'm not really interested in baseball...]

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うわ、なんか誤解されてるよ…」
`女生徒@『それじゃあ、いくね…』
`鈴@『…こちら、鈴。任務失敗』
`理樹@「うわちゃー」

MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Hey! Are you trying to make my little sister look like a weirdo?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Hey! Are you trying to make my little sister look like a weirdo?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `声@『あら、棗さん、新しい遊び？』
新しい声が聞こえる。
`鈴@『こんばんは』
`鈴@『…野球に興味はないか』
`女生徒@『あなた、私がソフトボール部次期キャプテン候補と知らずに仰ってるの？』
MESSAGE.EN: `Female Student@[Don't you know that I'm a candidate for the next softball club captain?]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Female Student@[Don't you know that I'm a candidate for the next softball club captain?]

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「なんか相手が悪いね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I don't think she's a suitable person...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I don't think she's a suitable person...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `女生徒@『あなたねぇ、筋肉馬鹿や、剣道部の宮沢さんと親しいからって、調子に乗ってるんじゃなくて？』
MESSAGE.EN: `Female Student@[I know you're close with the muscle idiot and Miyazawa-san from the kendo club. But aren't you getting carried away?]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Female Student@[I know you're close with the muscle idiot and Miyazawa-san from the kendo club. But aren't you getting carried away?]

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うわ、なんか不穏な空気…」
`真人@「オレが筋肉馬鹿だとぉ？　で、こっちは宮沢さん!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝She called me a muscle idiot? And you Miyazawa-san!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝She called me a muscle idiot? And you Miyazawa-san!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「不服か？　妥当なところだろう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝What's wrong with that? It sounds appropriate to me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝What's wrong with that? It sounds appropriate to me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「鈴、実は宮沢のほうが馬鹿で、この前服着たまま風呂に入ってたと言え」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Rin, say ❛Actually Miyazawa's an idiot too, he went into the bath wearing his uniform.❜❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Rin, say ❛Actually Miyazawa's an idiot too, he went into the bath wearing his uniform.❜❞

`女生徒@『わたくしに対して、なんて汚い言葉を…』
MESSAGE.EN: `Female Student@[How dare you say that to me...]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Female Student@[How dare you say that to me...]

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@『ん？　おまえは関係ない』
`女生徒@『ここにはわたくししかいないでしょうっ』
MESSAGE.EN: `Female Student@[Stop kidding around. There is only you and me here.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Female Student@[Stop kidding around. There is only you and me here.]

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@『実は宮沢のほうが馬鹿で、この前服着たまま風呂に入ってた』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[Actually Miyazawa's an idiot too, he went into the bath wearing his uniform.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[Actually Miyazawa's an idiot too, he went into the bath wearing his uniform.]

MESSAGE.JP: `女生徒@『なんですってぇ!?』
`理樹@「そんな火に油を注ぐようなことを…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That was like pouring oil into a fire...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That was like pouring oil into a fire...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `女生徒@『それは、あなたなりの陰口？』
MESSAGE.EN: `Female Student@[Are you badmouthing him behind his back?]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Female Student@[Are you badmouthing him behind his back?]

MESSAGE.JP: 相手の声は怒りに震えている。
MESSAGE.EN: Her voice was shaking with fury.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her voice was shaking with fury.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「まずいな…鈴、退却だ」
`鈴@『…服をつかまれてるのでできない』
`理樹@「うわぁ、やばいことになってんじゃんっ」
`謙吾@「助けにいくか？」
`理樹@「女子寮で見つかったら大事（おおごと）になるよ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No. It'd be even worse if they found us in the girls' dorm.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No. It'd be even worse if they found us in the girls' dorm.❞

`女生徒@『ば…か…？』
`鈴@『おまえのほうがばかだっ』
`理樹@「ありゃ…」
`恭介@「鈴がキレた…」
`佐々美@「ソフトボール部、次期キャプテン候補のこのわたくし、笹瀬川佐々美に勝てると思って？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝I am Sasami Sasasegawa, candidate for the captaincy of the softball club. Do you really think you could possibly win against me?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝I am Sasami Sasasegawa, candidate for the captaincy of the softball club. Do you really think you could possibly win against me?❞

`佐々美@「あら意外にやりますのね」
`佐々美@「ではわたくし自ら受けてたちましょう…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Well then, I shall take you on myself.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Well then, I shall take you on myself.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝To think you can't even beat these novice underclassmen. This isn't even worth talking about.❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝We should treat everything as a mission.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝We should treat everything as a mission.❞
